SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel

Class StudentDatabase

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.tools.Database<Student>
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Personnel.StudentDatabase
public class StudentDatabase extends Database<Student>
Represents a database for managing student entities. This class extends the generic Database class and provides methods for student registration, login validation, and username existence checks.

    • existUsername

      public boolean existUsername(String username)
      Checks if a username already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to check.
      Returns:
      True if the username exists, false otherwise.

    • validateStudentLogin

      public Student validateStudentLogin(String username, String pwd)
      Validates student login by checking the username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the student.
      pwd - The password of the student.
      Returns:
      The Student object if the login is successful.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the username does not exist or the password is incorrect.

      Parameters:

      check - The string containing characters to look for.
      Returns:

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
